verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:1
verses.text: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:2
verses.text: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:3
verses.text: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:4
verses.text: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.

verses.name: 1 Timothy 2:5
verses.text: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
